#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cmath>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
#define MaxM 1000000
#define MaxMby2 500000
#define rootMaxMby2 707
using namespace std;
bool nonPrime[MaxMby2+1];
vector<int> balPrimes;
int temp[2]={0,2};
void isBalanced(int step){
     if((temp[0]+step)==(temp[1]<<1)){
            balPrimes.push_back(temp[1]);                    
     }
	 temp[0]=temp[1];
     temp[1]=step;
}
void PrimeGenErastoSieve3(){
      int step;
      for (int m = 1; m < rootMaxMby2; m++) {
            if ( !nonPrime[m]) {
                  step=(m<<1)+1;
                  for (int k = m * (step+1); k <= MaxMby2; k += step)
                        nonPrime[k] = true;
                  isBalanced(step);
            }
      }
      for (int m = rootMaxMby2; m <= MaxMby2; m++)
          if (!nonPrime[m])
               isBalanced((m<<1)+1);
}
int main(void){
    int tcases,t;
    PrimeGenErastoSieve3();    
    scanf("%d",&tcases);
    while(tcases--){
                    scanf("%d",&t);
                    printf("%d\n",balPrimes[t-1]);
    }
    return 0;
}
